news_items.content: Here is the rewritten list of news articles:
**Related Questions**
* Chennai News: Govt rolls out big action plan to nominate 14,000 PwD in local bodies. CM introduces bills to increase welfare.
* Inadequate bus services amid sweltering heat leave commuters fuming in Chennai.
* Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M K Stalin demands resolution of the Katchatheevu issue and release of fishermen.
**Current News**
* 1 Kg Cocaine Worth Rs 6 Crore Seized In Chennai, 8 Arrested.
* Chennai police seek ban on dating app Grindr citing use in drug peddling.
* Headlines today: Get news headlines from India and around the world. Today's breaking news includes rain in Chennai.
* Top News: Vice-President attacks on top court; Supreme Court hears challenge to Waqf Amendment Act.
**Sports**
* IPL 2025, MI vs SRH Live Score: Hardik Pandya wins toss, Mumbai Indians bowl first at Wankhede.
* Infosys Q4 Results Highlights: Profit drops by 11.75%, final dividend of Rs 22; narrows FY26 revenue guidance to 0-3%.
**Technology**
* U.S. Tries to Crush China's AI Ambitions With Chips Crackdown.
* Nvidia shares plunge amid $5.5bn hit over export rules to China.
* OpenAI sues Elon Musk over 'unlawful harassment' of company.
**Environment and Science**
* Why AI Might Not Take All Our Jobs.
* Meet The AI Agent With Multiple Personalities.
* A.I Translates Sign Language in Real-Time.
* NASA's latest chennai news including the expected rise in gold prices due to a dust storm.
**Business and Finance**
* Top News: XAI adds a 'memory' feature to Grok.
* Jio Financial Q4 results: Profit rises 2% YoY to Rs 316 crore; Co declares Rs 0.5 dividend.
* SoftBank chief: Forget AGI, ASI will be here within 10 years.
* OpenAI logo in front of Elon Musk photo.
**Politics**
* TN minister K N Nehru's MP son, brother diverted funds from â‚¹30 crore bank loan: High Court
* Why AI might not take all our jobs.
